name: romany shawl
notes:
learn how to crochet the romany shawl with my step by step pattern and video tutorial. i imagine being on holiday in a candlelit taverna with this gorgeous crochet shawl wrapped around me, the metallic yarn glistening in the soft evening glow, lush!

a free version of this pattern and video tutorials for left and right handed can be found at https://blog.bellacococrochet.com/romany-crochet-shawl/

yarn: hobbii metallico (70% polyamide, 21 % acrylic, 9% merino wool), aran weight (#4), 115m (125yds), 50g (1.75oz). 6 balls of colour a (shade 2), 2 balls of colour b (shade 3), 2 balls of colour c (shade 4).

available in uk and us terms 

skill level: beginner 
gauge: at the end of row 5, your triangle should measure 21 cm (8.25 inch) wide by 10 cm (4 inch) from centre to point.
completed size: 176 cm (69.25 inch) approx. wide by 108 cm (42.5 inch) approx. from centre to point.

crochet skills needed:
ch - chain
ss - slip stitch
dc - double crochet
tr - treble crochet

we do not respond to ravelry messages, contact via website. pattern support only offered in community group https://www.facebook.com/groups/bellacococollectionsandcals

note
this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only; no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied. by purchasing and downloading this pattern, you agree to the following terms:

respect for copyright: this pattern is the intellectual property of the designer and is protected under copyright law. unauthorised reproduction or distribution of this pattern is a violation of these rights and may result in legal action.

disclaimer for use: this pattern is provided “as is” without any guarantees or warranty. in connection with the use of the pattern, the designer makes no warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, non-infringement, or fitness for a particular purpose. the designer is not liable for any damages, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, arising from the use or inability to use the pattern.

thank you for respecting the creative work and effort that has gone into designing this pattern. happy crocheting!

**product:** romany shawl crochet pattern


**purpose/function:** a downloadable pdf pattern that guides you step-by-step to create a stylish shawl. this pattern is perfect for personal use or creating handmade gifts for friends and family.


**target audience:** suitable for beginners and experienced crocheters who enjoy making wearable projects.


**features and benefits**

**features:**

clear, step-by-step written instructions with stitch abbreviations.

yarn and hook recommendations for optimal results.

**benefits:**

easy-to-follow instructions save time and reduce frustration.

gain confidence in working with basic stitches.

create a versatile and fashionable accessory that’s perfect for gifting or selling.

**technical information**

**file format:** pdf format delivered in 3 files in us and  uk terms with a technical support document.

**file size:** approximately 3 mb.

**device/software compatibility:** compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones, tablets, and computers.

**internet requirements:** an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase.

**usage instructions**

**how to download and prerequisites**


**usage instructions**

complete your purchase on etsy, ravelry, or shopify.

download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account’s download section.

open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions.

**prerequisites:**


basic crochet knowledge, including how to work double crochet (dc) and treble crochet (tr) stitches.

required tools: crochet hook (5mm), yarn, scissors, and a yarn needle.
